import{BASE_URL}from"./baseurl";import{commonAPI}from"./commonAPI";// register
export const registerAPI=async user=>{return await commonAPI("POST","".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/register"),user,"");};// login
export const loginAPI=async user=>{return await commonAPI("POST","".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),user,"");};// sell book
export const sellAPI=async(reqBody,reqHeader)=>{return await commonAPI("POST","".concat(BASE_URL,"/book/sell"),reqBody,reqHeader);};// getallbook
export const allBooksAPI=async()=>{return await commonAPI("GET","".concat(BASE_URL,"/books/all"),"","");};// delete book
export const deletebookAPI=async bookid=>{return await commonAPI("DELETE","".concat(BASE_URL,"/deletebook"),{bookid},"");};// get alluser
export const getusers=async()=>{return await commonAPI("GET","".concat(BASE_URL,"/allusers"),"","");};//  delete user
export const deleteuser=async userid=>{return await commonAPI("DELETE","".concat(BASE_URL,"/deleteuser"),{userid},"");};//  addorder
export const OrderAPI=async(order,header)=>{return await commonAPI("POST","".concat(BASE_URL,"/addorder"),order,header);};//  get all orders
export const allordersAPI=async()=>{return await commonAPI("GET","".concat(BASE_URL,"/allorders"),"","");};
